SELECT a.id, a.art_type, a.model_type, a.title, a.user_id, b.nick_name, a.status, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.org_id, g.org_name, w.id AS c_id, w.file_type, w.content, (select count(t.id) from art_works_comment t where t.art_works_id=a.id AND t.status='1' and t.del_flag='0') pl_num FROM art_works a ,sys_user b,sys_org g,art_works_content w
a.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and a.user_id = b.id and a.org_id=g.id and w.art_works_id=a.id and a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO art_works( id, title, model_type, art_type, user_id, org_id, status, location, dz_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{modelType}, #{artType}, #{user.id}, #{org.id}, #{status}, #{location}, #{dzNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
INSERT INTO art_works_content( id, content, file_type, art_works_id, sort ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{content}, #{fileType}, #{artWorksId}, #{sort} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM art_works a ,sys_user b where a.user_id=b.id and b.open_id=#{openId} and a.del_flag='0' UNION ALL SELECT count(1) FROM art_works a ,sys_user b where a.user_id=b.id and b.open_id=#{openId} and a.del_flag='0' and a.status='0' UNION ALL SELECT count(1) FROM user_artworks_collect a ,sys_user b where a.user_id=b.id and b.open_id=#{openId} UNION ALL SELECT count(1) FROM user_art_interest a ,sys_user b where a.user_id=b.id and b.open_id=#{openId} UNION ALL SELECT count(1) FROM sys_user_auth a ,sys_user b WHERE a.user_id=b.id and b.open_id=#{openId} and a.status='0' and a.del_flag='0'

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.location, a.model_type AS "modelType", a.status, CASE WHEN a.model_type='0' THEN (SELECT b.content FROM art_works_content b where b.art_works_id=a.id and b.file_type='0' LIMIT 0,1) WHEN a.model_type='1' THEN (SELECT b.content FROM art_works_content b where b.art_works_id=a.id and b.file_type='1' LIMIT 0,1) else '' END AS "mediaUrl", (SELECT t.content FROM art_works_content t where t.art_works_id=a.id and t.file_type='2' LIMIT 0,1) AS "content", a.dz_num AS "dzNum", CASE WHEN a.status='1' THEN (SELECT count(*) FROM art_works_comment v WHERE v.art_works_id=a.id) ELSE 0 END AS "plNum", a.create_date AS "createDate" FROM art_works a, sys_user c WHERE a.user_id = c.id AND c.open_id = #{openId} AND a.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.create_date DESC

SELECT a.id, a.user_id AS "user.id", a.title, a.location, a.model_type AS "modelType", a.status, a.dz_num AS "dzNum", CASE WHEN a.status='1' THEN (SELECT count(*) FROM art_works_comment v WHERE v.art_works_id=a.id) ELSE 0 END AS "plNum", a.create_date AS "createDate", (select count(*) FROM user_artworks_collect b,sys_user c where b.user_id=c.id and b.art_works_id=#{id} and c.open_id=#{openId} ) AS "hasCollected", (SELECT count(*) FROM user_dz_artworks d where d.user_id = a.user_id and d.art_works_id = a.id and d.del_flag='0') AS "hasDz" FROM art_works a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.art_works_id AS "artWorksId", a.content, a.file_type AS "fileType" FROM art_works_content a WHERE a.art_works_id = #{artWorksId} ORDER BY a.file_type

SELECT a.id, b.id AS "userId", b.nick_name AS "nickName", b.photo, b.art_type AS "artType", b.art_level AS "artLevel", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.content, a.dz_num AS "dzNum", (SELECT count(*) FROM art_works_comment c where c.parent=a.id and c.status='1' and c.del_flag='0') AS "msgNum", (SELECT count(*) FROM user_dz_comment d where d.user_id = a.create_by and d.comment_id = a.id and d.del_flag='0') AS "hasDz" FROM art_works_comment a, sys_user b WHERE a.art_works_id = #{artWorksId} and a.parent IS NULL AND a.create_by = b.id
SELECT a.id, a.content, a.file_type AS "fileType", a.art_works_id AS "artWorksId", a.gif_url AS "gifUrl" FROM art_works_content a WHERE a.file_type = '1' AND a.gif_url IS NULL LIMIT 0,5
mapper.update: UPDATE art_works_content SET gif_url = #{gifUrl} WHERE id = #{id}
